Submit Coinbase Exchange Feature Requests and Suggestions
2 points by Coinbase_Rosey 16 hours ago | discuss
It has been almost a month since we launched Coinbase Exchange. We've seen great success, but we want to know, what suggestions and feature requests do our customers have for improving the Exchange? Submit your suggestions through the link below:
